Challenge

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.Controller

  • class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to be used to allows the player to be controlled by the user. It allows the input of arrow keys in order to move the player.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    George Carpenter

        void processKeyEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event,
                     Level level,
                     Game game,
                     javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas,
                     javafx.scene.layout.StackPane root)
        Takes in certain inputs and outputs player actions.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to be read.
        level - The level being played
        game - The game to be altered and re-rendered.
        canvas - The canvas for rendering the game.
        root - The StackPane holding the scene

        Method to help reset the level. Makes a new level

        Returns:
        A new level with the inputted name
